pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:5.1: 75. The training rule on twelve years of seniority
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:6.2: At that time nuns who had twelve years of seniority gave the full ordination without being approved by the Order.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:6.4: and they did not know what was allowable and what was not.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:6.5: And their students, too, were ignorant and incompetent,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:6.6: and they did not know what was allowable and what was not.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.3: “How can nuns who have twelve years of seniority give the full ordination without being approved by the Order?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.7: How can nuns who have twelve years of seniority give the full ordination without being approved by the Order?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.10: he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.11: “Monks, I allow giving approval to a nun who has twelve years of seniority to give the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.12: And it is to be given in this way.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.13: After approaching the Order of nuns, that nun who has twelve years of seniority should put her upper robe over one shoulder and pay respect at the feet of the senior nuns. She should then squat on her heels, put the palms of her hands together, and say,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.14: ‘Venerables, I, the nun so-and-so who has twelve years of seniority, ask the Order for approval to give the full ordination.’
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.15: And she should ask a second
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.17: The Order should decide whether that nun is competent and has a sense of conscience.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.19: If she is ignorant and shameless, approval should not be given.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.20: If she is ignorant but has a sense of conscience, approval should not be given.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.21: If she is competent but shameless, approval should not be given.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.22: If she is competent and has a sense of conscience, approval should be given.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.23: And it is to be given in this way.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:7.24: A competent and capable nun should inform the Order:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:8.1: ‘Please, Venerables, I ask the Order to listen.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:8.2: This nun so-and-so who has twelve years of seniority is asking the Order for approval to give the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:8.3: If it seems appropriate to the Order, the Order should give approval to nun so-and-so who has twelve years of seniority to give full ordinations.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:9.1: Please, Venerables, I ask the Order to listen.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:9.2: This nun so-and-so who has twelve years of seniority is asking the Order for approval to give the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:9.3: The Order gives approval to nun so-and-so who has twelve years of seniority to give the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:9.4: Any nun who approves of giving approval to nun so-and-so who has twelve years of seniority to give the full ordination should remain silent.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:9.5: Any nun who does not approve should speak up.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:10.1: The Order has given approval to nun so-and-so who has twelve years of seniority to give the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:10.2: The Order approves and is therefore silent. I will remember it thus.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:11.1: Then, after criticizing those nuns in many ways for being difficult to support …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:11.2: “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:12.1: ‘If a nun who has twelve years of seniority gives the full ordination without approval from the Order, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:13.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:14.1: Who has twelve years of seniority:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:14.2: who has reached twelve years of seniority.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:15.2: approval to give the full ordination has not been given though a legal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:16.1: If, intending to give the full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:16.2: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:16.3: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:16.4: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:16.5: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:17.1: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as legitimate, and she gives the full ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:17.2: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure if it is, and she gives the full ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:17.3: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as illegitimate, and she gives the full ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:18.1: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she perceives it as legitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:18.2: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but she is unsure if it is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:18.3: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and she perceives it as illegitimate, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:19.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc75:20.1: The fifth training rule is finished.
